name: Nashor's Tooth

tips: Nashor's ToothAttacks deal bonus damage +45% Attack Speed +20 Ability HasteMagic Fang: Obtain 30 Attack Damage or 60 Ability Power (Adaptive).Gnaw: Attacks deal adaptive damage (15 + 20% bonus+ 30% bonus) on hit.

3000


This item is perfect for champions who blend auto-attacks with magic damage.
It provides a hefty boost to attack speed and reduces ability cooldowns, allowing you to cast spells more frequently in fights.
The “Magic Fang” passive adapts to your build by granting either bonus attack damage or ability power, adding flexibility.
With each auto-attack, “Gnaw” deals adaptive magic damage on hit, making it especially effective against tanky targets and for wearing down opponents over time.
